buildCommand: cd rust-wasm && wasm-pack build --target web --release && cd .. && mkdir -p src/rust-wasm/pkg && cp -r rust-wasm/pkg/* src/rust-wasm/pkg/ && bun run build
installCommand: curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y && source $HOME/.cargo/env && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && curl https://rustwasm.github.io/wasm-pack/installer/init.sh -sSf | sh && bun install
